item.title: The Art of Vulnerability
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Lyka Sebelina)
item.description:
The struggle of being the last card.

People always say that the youngest are the spoiled one but no one talks about the burden of being the youngest.

How to hone your new superpower: teaching

I learned early in my developer journey that teaching others is an effective way to quickly deepen my understanding of a new concept or technology. Iâ€™ve found that needing to articulate a particular concept to others causes me to revisit my assumptions and leads me to do additional research to fill any knowledge gaps.
Link
